root.name: Astebreed
root.description: Astebreed appears to be a slower-than-average, High Definition, bullet hell shooter similar to the western XBox LIVE Arcade game Omega Five. The texture application used for Astebreed is known as Marmoset which was created by a western computer graphics company. There is a gameplay video of Astebreed in action available at Edelweiss's official YouTube account at this link location.This game is currently set to be localized for a western audience sometime in the middle of 2013.
